website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for many larger knobs, but be sure their closures are secured completely for child safety.
pros: Larger than many knob covers, so they are perfect for wide knobs
Ideal for some range brands, such as Samsung, that tend to have larger knobs
cons: Some covers have flimsy closures that are too easy to open
Won't fit knobs that are slightly recessed

customer_reviews.title: These fit very well on larger knobs
customer_reviews.text: These safety covers are well made. They are hard plastic. not cheap - so doesn't crack . i've used for few weeks now and they're holding up well like the first day. my 2 year old and 4 year old cannot turn the knob with the covers on. so these work very well and does the job. these are "large" really. larger than the normal ones. fits my GE Professional series stove. very quick/easy to install. takes 5 minutes. pop out the stove knob. Fix these covers and knob in it, and close it. using them is very easy for adults too. no complaints. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VDesi

customer_reviews.title: Good for Samsung stoves but measure carefully
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and I'm using it, but it was still small for my LG gas stove. I can't close the tops properly but it's ended the accidental turn ons.
customer_reviews.author: Diana DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. They are super easy to install... No need to remove the knobs or anything like that. They are also easy to open and close while cooking. These are perfect for keeping our toddler away from the gas stove burner and oven knobs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessiegirl9

customer_reviews.title: Extra large covers
customer_reviews.text: These were easily installed, large enough for the big knobs on the range and it keep the grandkids from turning on the stove. That's a win in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: This is a safety measure.
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I needed those knob covers because my nephew, Eddie needs to stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bachman

customer_reviews.title: These did not fit my Samsung stove
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description, they do not fit my range. The handles are recessed into the stove panel. They otherwise look like they would be adequate if they fit flat against your stove.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Totally baby proof
customer_reviews.text: She’s mad because she can’t pull the knobs off...but hey...she also can’t start the burner up!! Must have for gas stove owning parents to be.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Knob does not stay close
customer_reviews.text: The safety knob tabs use to close are too lose that when your child touches the safety stove knob opens. This will not work. Also, my 23 month-child was able to pull the cover easily within 10 seconds by just playing after I put these knobs in my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit ALL Samsung Ranges
customer_reviews.text: Will not work on Samsung model NX58H9500WS. Cannot attach the burner knob to the post when installed. The post isn't long enough. Time to continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Using them as a safety cover from my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Toddler removed as soon as I installed
customer_reviews.text: These "child safety" knobs are a joke. My 1yr old hobbled right up and removed all of them right after I attached. Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They were not large enough for the handles and they were supposed to be extra large
customer_reviews.author: Karen Durant

customer_reviews.title: Covers knobs so toddlers can't turn on stove accidentally
customer_reviews.text: Adults can still accidentally turn knobs on leaning against them
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as expected, and fits perfectly over the Knobs on my gas range.
customer_reviews.author: James Francalangia

customer_reviews.title: Baby Proofed
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new stove and when we went to go put the covers on so the baby couldn't get to it we found that the standard covers would not fit. With a little searching around these are the only oversized covers available. Thank you for making these! Our home is now baby proofed again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Craig

product_meta.title: Extra Large Child Safety Stove Knob Covers (Set of 6)
product_meta.description:
PLEASE CHECK SIZES TO AVOID RETURNS - SEE LAST IMAGES FOR MEASUREMENTS OR READ BELOW 


Hi! 
These clear plastic stove knob covers are extra large. We made them specifically because we simply could not find covers that fit our Samsung stove. 

PLEASE CHECK SIZES TO AVOID RETURNS - SEE IMAGE FOR MEASUREMENTS -- IMPORTANT: Stove knobs should be no wider than 2.2 inches or 6.2 centimeters and no taller than 1.2 inches or 3.75 cm 

NOTE: this will not fit ranges with recessed knobs (see last image)
feature_bullets: fits many Samsung ranges (NOT WITH RECESSED KNOBS)
For stove knobs up to 2.25 inches wide and 1.25 inches tall
PLEASE CHECK MEASUREMENTS TO AVOID RETURNS.
NOTE: not for ranges with recessed knobs (see last image)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars57 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
